title: Episode 37: Smoke & Mirrors
description: Six months ago, Hidden Brain's Max Nesterak made a resolution to quit smoking. But as we all know... resolutions are made to be broken. This week, we check in with Max to find out how he's fared, and give you social science insight to help you quit your bad habits too.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
